experience.desc: Leading mobile development projects with a focus on scalable deployments, cloud integration, and robust CI/CD pipelines.
Contributing to mobile development with cloud integration, architecture, and testing, ensuring scalable and maintainable solutions.
Focused on Android development using Java, Kotlin, and Firebase, with an emphasis on async programming and version control.

projects.name: FitnessPro - Full-Stack Workout App
projects.description: Designed and developed a scalable mobile fitness app offering custom workout plans, progress tracking, and multimedia coaching. Integrated Firebase for real-time data sync and AWS for hosting services. Implemented CI/CD pipelines for seamless deployment and release automation to Play Store and App Store. Added analytics and push notifications for enhanced user engagement.

projects.name: DocBook - Healthcare Booking Platform
projects.description: Built a HIPAA-compliant mobile solution where users book appointments, consult doctors online, and manage prescriptions. Integrated AWS Cognito for secure login, AWS RDS for database, and deployed backend APIs using AWS Lambda. Utilized Jenkins for CI/CD automation and monitored usage via AWS CloudWatch. Published app to Play Store with automated rollout.

projects.name: EduConnect - Cross-Platform E-Learning Portal
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive LMS platform with student-teacher interaction, live classes, quizzes, and certification. Used React for web and Flutter for mobile with Firebase backend. Integrated Google Cloud functions for load balancing and Stripe for payments. CI/CD through GitHub Actions for multi-platform deployment. Hosted on Firebase Hosting and Vercel.

projects.name: BizFinder - Location-Based Business Discovery App
projects.description: Created a location-aware business discovery app with Google Maps integration, user reviews, and in-app messaging. AWS Amplify and Cognito were used for user management and hosting. Built pipelines using Bitrise for automated builds and Play Store submission. Included geofencing, real-time chat, and caching for performance.

projects.name: Invoicer - Professional Invoice Generator
projects.description: An enterprise-grade invoicing app supporting multi-currency, PDF generation, email automation, and client management. Integrated AWS SES for invoice mailing, Flutter for mobile UI, and Jenkins for CI/CD. Authentication managed via Firebase Auth, and PDF templates stored in AWS S3. Released with versioning via Google Play Console tracks.

projects.name: TaskSync - Agile Sprint Management App
projects.description: Designed for software teams to plan, track, and collaborate on sprint tasks. Implemented real-time syncing via Firebase Firestore, user authentication with AWS Cognito, and scheduled notifications via AWS EventBridge. GitHub Actions used for test automation and deployment. Offers role-based access control and activity logs.

projects.name: ShopEase - Scalable E-Commerce App
projects.description: Created an e-commerce solution with integrated payment gateways, order tracking, and admin dashboard. Leveraged Firebase for product catalog, AWS Lambda for backend logic, and Stripe for secure payments. Used Bitbucket pipelines for CI/CD and deployed admin dashboard on AWS Amplify.

projects.name: ChatLoop - Real-Time Messaging Platform
projects.description: Secure and scalable messaging app with end-to-end encryption, group chat, media sharing, and presence status. Used Firebase for real-time messaging and AWS KMS for encryption key management. Deployed CI/CD with Codemagic and implemented crash reporting via Firebase Crashlytics.

projects.name: MyBudget - Personal Finance Tracker
projects.description: Designed a personal budgeting app supporting recurring transactions, visual analytics, and goal tracking. Integrated biometric authentication and encrypted local data. Used Firebase for sync and GitHub Actions for CI. Offers monthly PDF reports and cloud backup through Google Drive API.

projects.name: EventNow - Event Management Ecosystem
projects.description: Developed a complete platform for event organizers and attendees, including QR-based check-in, real-time updates, and ticketing system. CI/CD with GitLab ensured automated testing and release. Hosted backend with Firebase Functions and Cloud Scheduler for reminders.

projects.name: SafeSpace - Mental Wellness Tracker
projects.description: Built a privacy-focused mental health journal with mood tracking, affirmations, and reminders. Integrated AWS S3 for cloud sync and Cognito for user authentication. Used Hive for encrypted local storage and implemented CI/CD through Codemagic for frequent updates.

projects.name: QuickNotes - Offline Notes & Cloud Sync
projects.description: A fast and secure notes app with tag management, color coding, offline access, and Google Drive sync. Authenticated using Firebase Auth and released using Bitrise CI/CD workflows. Included nightly builds and crash reporting for stable releases.
